__e: Banging chicks, hanging out, watching TV, drinking chocolate milk with a five-year-old-- this Thanksgiving's been pretty sick.
Someone get me some chocolate milk... with extra salt.
That's where the chocolate got its name, incidentally.
It's like you're chocolate and I'm...
- What? Chocolate's the only friend he's got!
He gave me chocolate and said it was good for my brain.
Do you have some chocolate chip or something?

You know, when somebody comes to your house for dinner or the weekend or something... and they don't bring a bottle of wine or some chocolates or biscuits or something... you %#%$! about that person when they leave saying:
Do you think this is chocolate sauce or blood?
You can have all the chocolate you want.
And will you throw in something chocolate that won't make my ass look fat?
That's not that chocolate that I told you you couldn't have, is it?
This is chocolate for your son.
- Oh, you didn't get any body chocolate.
And where do you think I hid my chocolate from you all those years?
(slurping) How's that chocolate milk, Gary? Mmm. Fantastic.
- Yes, you can have a calcium chocolate.
